QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sat, 14 Aug 2021 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Leicester City won 1–0 over Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sat, 14 Aug 2021 14:00:00 GMT.
